products.title: William Morris Compton China Blue Roller Blind
products.description: Once believed to be william morris last design, compton is now recognised as the work of john henry dearle (18601932) a colleague of morris. Featuring a plethora of climbing plants and leaves, this superb design looks just as high fashion now as it did when it was first desig once believed to be william morris last design, compton is now recognised as the work of john henry dearle (18601932) a colleague of morris.

products.title: William Morris Acorn Soft Blue Roller Blind
products.description: William morris designs were inspired by plant based forms. Part of their collaboration with the v&a, this delightful acorn soft blue roller blind features a splendid combination of leaves, flowers and acorns. This pretty soft blue colour makes us think of the clear blue sky william morris designs were inspired by plant based forms.

products.title: William Morris Compton China Blue Roman Blind
products.description: A striking design from their william morris range in collaboration with the v&a, compton was originally produced in 1896 for compton hall, the house of laurence w. Hodson, a patron of the arts. The design is now recognised as the work of john henry dearle, who worked for morris a striking design from their william morris range in collaboration with the v&a, compton was originally produced in 1896 for compton hall, the house of laurence w.

products.title: William Morris Compton Velvet Dusky Teal Roman Blind
products.description: Were still very much a fan of teal, and this contemporary colour trend continues to pop up in lots of their favourite designs. Featured here in the compton velvet dusky teal roman blind, from their william morris range in collaboration with the v&a, teal has been combined with were still very much a fan of teal, and this contemporary colour trend continues to pop up in lots of their favourite designs.

products.title: William Morris Acorn Soft Blue Roman Blind
products.description: Part of their collaboration with the v&a, this william morris designed acorn soft blue roman blind truly transcends the times. The beautifully classic soft blue tone is a great choice if youre looking to create a fresh and contemporary scheme with a touch of historic appeal.
